doc.knownrelatives: Zeus (father), Hera (mother), Eris, Hebe (sisters), Aphordite (ex-wife), Demeter, Vesta/Hestia (aunts), Pluto/Hades,  Poseidon (uncles), Ares (brother), Apollo, Dionysus, Hercules, Hermes (half-brothers), Athena, Artemis]], Hebe (half-sisters), Cronus (grandfather), Rhea (grandmother), Ouranus (great-grandfather), Gaea (great-grandmother), numerous others
occupation: weapon maker and armorer of Olympus
doc.powers: Hephaestus possesses the conventional superhuman physical attributes of an Olympian god, the lifting of 40 tons. Although lame in his right leg, he possesses great physical power in his arms and shoulders.
